doc.title: Common Threads: Stories of Life After Trauma
doc.plot: Common Threads revolves around the lives of Connie Robillard and Marcel Duclos, both whom have survived a life of abuse and neglect. Based on the book, "Common Threads", written by Connie and Marcel, Amber Ward directs this remarkable feature-length documentary. A story of healing and helping others, overcoming obstacles, and understanding the long term effects of emotional and physical abuse.
